summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a road with moderate traffic. A person on a bicycle appears from the right side and moves towards the center of the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation. The vehicle ahead is maintaining a steady speed, while the self-driving vehicle is approaching the cyclist.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the cyclist. The driver is likely preparing to decelerate to avoid a collision with the cyclist who is moving towards the center of the road.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A person on a bicycle, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation. 2) Front: A vehicle ahead, approximately 30 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.
